name.value: Visit the Github repository for more information

description.value: Metadata and access information about a code system.

definition.value: Metadata and access information about a code system.

short.value: the local identifier that uniquely identifies the code system within the context of the implementing service

definition.value: the local identifier that uniquely identifies the code system within the context of the implementing service. Note that the about URI is the globally unique identifier.

short.value: the category or type of resource that the code system represents

definition.value: the category or type of resource that the code system represents.

short.value: the subject domain of the ontology

definition.value: the subject domain of the ontology

short.value: the nature of the content of the ontology

definition.value: the nature of the content of the ontology

short.value: the purpose for which the ontology was originally designed

definition.value: the purpose for which the ontology was originally designed

short.value: a reference to an external code system that is included as a component of the referenced code system

definition.value: a reference to an external code system that is included as a component of the referenced code system. The Wine Ontology, as an example, includes the Food Ontology as one of its components. Similarly, the US Edition of SNOMED-CT includes the international edition.

short.value: a DirectoryURI that references the known versions of this code system

definition.value: a DirectoryURI that references the known versions of this code system.

short.value: a reference to the code system version marked as CURRENT in the service instance

definition.value: a reference to the code system version marked as CURRENT in the service instance.

short.value: information about a tool used to create the ontology

definition.value: information about a tool used to create the ontology
